function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High concentration of inorganic compounds for disinfection","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of virus sustainability on surfaces","category":"Soil","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparative study of virus behavior on different surfaces","category":"Soil","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of infective organisms on metal surfaces and in aerosols","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coronavirus sustainability on various surfaces, leading to potential transmission through touch.","category":"Soil","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Violation of ecosystem due to large human population gathering and intervention","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mobile remote presence systems for medical consultations","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of infectious disease transmission to frontline healthcare workers","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strategy to handle downtime in cloud computing","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Latency in real-time diagnosis and data processing","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of exploration of cloud computing for covid-19 response","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dependency on iot devices for covid-19 management","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of robots and drones for quarantine assistance and containment of covid-19","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Usage of drones for delivery and transportation during the pandemic","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robotic-assisted surgery ras during the pandemic","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global increase in medical device sales","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on iot devices for early diagnosis may lead to inaccurate results and mismanagement of covid-19 cases.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proliferation of iot and sensors in healthcare institutes","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of robots and drones in high-risk environments","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of redundancy in bathroom and lavatory facilities in existing building stock","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rear extensions do not allow for a ready installation of a containment space without sacrificing room functionality or garden space.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conversion of a front room into a containment space places the containment space in the heart of the sleeping quarters.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Recent homes with double garages at the front may require the owner to forgo a car parking space in order to insert a containment room module.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Historic buildings with limited modification possibilities may hinder the implementation of modern disease prevention measures","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rear property extensions and lack of space for containment areas may limit the implementation of quarantine measures","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced carrying capacity of elevators due to social distancing requirements","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for retrofitting existing building stock to pandemic-proof residential housing","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on stairs as the main mode of inter-storey communication creating public health benefit","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Narrow corridors and bottleneck positioning of doors","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation in corridor spaces","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High density housing and communal spaces can lead to a concentration of residents and increased flow of people, which can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial separation and narrow corridors can create bottlenefs and bottlenecks that increase the likelihood of close contact and the spread of pathogens between individuals passing through the area.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shared access points and common bottlenecks in apartment buildings make them vulnerable to becoming hotspots for contagious diseases, leading to rapid transmission among residents.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate ventilation in housing design","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sound dampening in interior spaces","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shared central air-conditioning without individual filtration zones","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation in the built environment leading to the potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to open air spaces leading to confinement-related mental health issues in isolated occupants.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of living spaces due to external clothing and footwear being brought indoors","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hand hygiene facilities and access to wet cells bathrooms in proximity to the living space","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Permeable zone between exterior and interior in residential buildings","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate containment space and functionality in residential buildings","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to minimize the likelihood of virus transmission through structural, physical, and practical means","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dispersal of coronaviruses on surfaces in built environments","category":"Soil","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Facilitated dispersal of sars-cov-2 in office environments and public transport systems with restricted airflow","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus survival on surfaces for prolonged periods","category":"Soil","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of other zoonotic coronaviruses as a threat to humans","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through aerosols and surfaces","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to incorporate epidemiological considerations in building design","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and room design in communal facilities","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"}]}
